subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The Masters champion, Charl Schwartzel, boldly attacked the back nine at the Gary Player Country Club to seize a share of the first-round lead in the Sun City Challenge in South Africa with Lee Westwood.
snippet: The Masters champion, Charl Schwartzel, boldly attacked the back nine at the Gary Player Country Club to seize a share of the first-round lead in the Sun City Challenge in South Africa with Lee Westwood.
